#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t;
    cin >>t;

    while(t--) {
        long long int n,m,a=1,b=1;
        cin >>n>>m;

        if(n == 1) {
            cout<<1<<"/"<<1<<endl;
            continue;
        }

        while(n>1) {
            a=(a+b)%m;
            b=(a+b)%m;
            n--;
        }

        cout<<a<<"/"<<b<<endl;
    }

    return 0;
}
